title: Memory Forensics with Volatility
description: Analyze a memory dump using Volatility to find a hidden flag.
hints: Focus on process enumeration to find anomalies.
Explore hidden processes using Volatility plugins.
Check for a process that seems out of place or running suspicious commands.
learningObjectives: Use Volatility to analyze a memory dump.
Identify and interpret suspicious processes in memory.
Understand common artifacts in memory images relating to malware or compromise.
